name: Gun Dash
description:
Save the world from vicious enemies in this 2D bullet-hell platformer

The world has been overridden and corrupted by vicious monsters. Harmless insects and creatures have been placed under a curse. Travel through this cursed world destroying the enemies to lift the curse. Collect new weapons and trade with traders as you go!

Features:

  • 8 different maps to explore
  • 4 unique enemies
  • 4 weapons 
  • 1 soundtrack

If you want a closer look at the development of this game you can check out my YouTube channel - Here
